text: Parents should not smoke in order to discourage their kids from smoking. A child is more likely to smoke when they have been raised in the environment of a smoker.
author: Christy Turlington

text: There are only two lasting bequests we can hope to give our children. One of these is roots, the other, wings.
author: Hodding Carter

text: Studies show that children best flourish when one mom and one dad are there to raise them.
author: John Boehner

text: It's hard enough to work and raise a family when your kids are all healthy and relatively normal, but when you add on some kind of disability or disease, it can just be such a burden.
author: Patricia Heaton

text: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance.
author: Franklin P. Jones
